import React, { useState } from 'react' import { BiSolidHide ,BiSolidShow } from "react-icons/bi"; const SignupForm = () => { const[showPassword,setShowPassword]=useState(false); const[formData,setFormData]=useState({firstName:"",lastName:"",email:"",password:"",confirmPassword:""}) function changeHandler(e){ e.preventDefault(); setFormData((prevData)=>({ ...prevData, [e.target.name]:e.target.value })) } return (
) } export default SignupForm
